casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Marvin Everett MILLER, Jr. 217PA17-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 30, 2019 Mark Montgomery, Attorney at Law, for Miller, Marvin Everette (Jr.). David J. Adinolfi, II, Adren Harris, Special Deputy Attorney Generals, J. Douglas Henderson, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th of November 2018 by State of NC to Deem Response Timely Filed:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 30th of January 2019."
